::Scrapper::
"Thats great Scavenger. What is it this time, a toaster, a pizza 
oven, or wait, could it be a microwave. You and you junk, jeez."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scavenger::
> 
> "Hey guys, I found it!" a voice came from behind the other 
constructicons as Scavenger enters the room, carrying a large piece 
of scrap metal. He then sees all the other bots, looking 
questioningly at the rest of the Constructicons.
